name: Windows Manage Proxy Setting Cloner
author: mubix <mubix@hak5.org>
description:
This module copies the proxy settings from the current user to the
        targeted user SID, supports remote hosts as well if remote registry
        is allowed.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: RHOST
options.description: Remote host to clone settings to, defaults to local

options.name: SID
options.description: SID of user to clone settings to, defaults to SYSTEM
